verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, the expression levels of p-JNK (XREF_FIG), p-ERK1/2 (XREF_FIG) and p-p38 MAPK (XREF_FIG) were significantly increased following the addition of 30 mM Na + to the cell culture medium (additional to the levels already in medium) for 30 min, and such an increase was maintained until 120 min post-treatment.
evidence: levels of p-JNK ( XREF_FIG ), p-ERK1/2 ( XREF_FIG ) and p-p38 MAPK
